page.title: 15HOUSING/VANDALISM
page.content:
In the area where I live, St. Giles estate, the houses are terrible. All of the windows are smashed and most of the gardens are like rubbish dumps. I am lucky because I live in a street called the Oval and that is quite a good street. Just a few minutes walk from where I live they have just built some new houses but recently they have all been vandalised. All over most of Lincoln the houses are quite posh and neat but about 30% of them have been vandalised. There are quite a lot of very old houses in Lincoln and many of them are in very good condition. Altogether though, Lincoln is a very neat and tidy city and the housing is very good.
Angela Penney
